description:
Kohei Hayasaka (早坂 絋平 Hayasaka Kōhei) is a third-year university student taking up Engineering and the bassist/leader of Fujin RIZING!.
The band leader who looks after everyone as the trusted senior member. He`s been called "Ko-nii" since the group was small and it stuck. While usually a calm and kind person, he gets rather terrifying if he gets mad. He possesses extraordinary superhuman strength but avoids any and all household appliances due to his clumsy nature. The others members try to keep him from spicy foods because it can change people...
name: Hayasaka Kouhei
